LanguageData.GR_ElectroEggHigh.stages.0.label: active mechanites
LanguageData.GR_ElectroEggHigh.stages.0.description: Swallowing that mechanoid egg made me feel great. I can almost feel the mechanites in my stomach!
LanguageData.GR_ElectroEggWithdrawal.stages.1.label: active mechanites withdrawal
LanguageData.GR_ElectroEggWithdrawal.stages.1.descrip: All my body itches... It is as if the mechanites are turning against me.
LanguageData.GR_FeatherdustHigh.stages.0.label: high on featherdust
LanguageData.GR_FeatherdustHigh.stages.0.description: I just smoked ground feathers from a scientific abomination and... I feel fine.
LanguageData.GR_FeatherdustWithdrawal.stages.1.label: Featherdust withdrawal
LanguageData.GR_FeatherdustWithdrawal.stages.1.descri: I really wish I could smoke.
LanguageData.GR_RoyalJellyHigh.stages.0.label: royal jelly warmth
LanguageData.GR_RoyalJellyHigh.stages.0.description: Royal jelly is delicious... I want to eat more of it!
LanguageData.GR_RoyalJellyWithdrawal.stages.1.label: royal jelly withdrawal
LanguageData.GR_RoyalJellyWithdrawal.stages.1.descrip: I really would love to eat some royal jelly right now.
LanguageData.GR_WearingThrumboHorn.stages.0.label: wearing thrumbo horn
LanguageData.GR_WearingBunnyEars.stages.0.label: wearing bunny ears
LanguageData.GR_HeWearsAntennae.stages.0.label: wearing insectoid antennae
LanguageData.GR_HeWearsAntennae.stages.0.description: So much information! Make it stop!
LanguageData.GR_DamnMammaries.stages.0.label: feeling like a fat cow
LanguageData.GR_DamnMammaries.stages.0.description: I'm being milked like an animal! This is really deeply humilliating!
LanguageData.GR_AteRatMilk.stages.0.label: what was that milk?
LanguageData.GR_AteRatMilk.stages.0.description: Did I just drink rat milk? It can't be, can it?
LanguageData.AA_BeenPsionicallyNuzzled.stages.0.label: psionically nuzzled
LanguageData.AA_BeenPsionicallyNuzzled.stages.0.descr: That pretty fox sure seems to know how to make you feel loved...
